comment:
Extracted Variables:
- C: Number of calcium pills to be taken
- V: Number of vitamin D pills to be taken

Extracted Constraints:
1. C + V \geq 130 (total number of pills taken over a month)
2. V \geq 40 (at least 40 should be vitamin D pills)
3. C > V (more calcium pills than vitamin D pills)

Objective:
Minimize the total time it takes for the medication to be effective: 5C + 6V
